title: Rails 3.0.9 with postgres crashes on show actions.
body:
I'm using the default settings for active admin.

Exception

```
PGError: ERROR:  column active_admin_comments.admin does not exist
LINE 1: ...ents" WHERE "active_admin_comments"."namespace" = "active_ad...
                                                             ^
: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "active_admin_comments" WHERE "active_admin_comments"."namespace" = "active_admin_comments"."admin" AND ("active_admin_comments".resource_id = 2 AND "active_admin_comments".resource_type = 'NewsPost')
```

Partial stacktrace

```
activerecord (3.0.9) lib/active_record/relation/calculations.rb:58:in `count'
activeadmin (0.2.2) lib/active_admin/comments/views/active_admin_comments.rb:20:in `title_content'
activeadmin (0.2.2) lib/active_admin/comments/views/active_admin_comments.rb:13:in `build'
activeadmin (0.2.2) lib/active_admin/arbre/html.rb:36:in `build_tag'
activeadmin (0.2.2) lib/active_admin/arbre/html.rb:50:in `insert_tag'
activeadmin (0.2.2) lib/active_admin/arbre/element.rb:17:in `active_admin_comments_for'
```

The offending code appears to be in `lib/active_admin/comments/views/active_admin_comments.rb`

```
    def record_comments
      @record_comments ||= @record.active_admin_comments.where(:namespace => active_admin_namespace.name)
    end
```

This fixes the error

```
    def record_comments
      @record_comments ||= @record.active_admin_comments.where(:namespace => active_admin_namespace.name.to_s)
    end
```
